page.title: 05LEISURE IN TWEEDBANK
page.content: Tweedbank has many recreational facilities such as the {Athletics {Stadium,}the {Bowling Club, Cross {Country track}and the {BMX track.The {BMX track }attracts many cylists who race about on it. Every Sunday there is a competition which many people from the Borders take part in. Medals and cups are awarded. The {Athletics {Stadium}consists of a running track, 400 metres with 8 lanes. There is also the high jump, javelin, and shot putt. The stadium is open all week and is used by professionals or those who are just learning.It is available for hire for competitions and events,or regular club training sessions.The {Indoor Bowling Club}is open all week for those who have membership and it can be booked for private functions.
